entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023
